entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 02:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
